infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses Bluetooth to connect to your PineTime watch for continuous health monitoring.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This app uses Bluetooth to connect to your PineTime watch for health monitoring.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothWhileInUseUsageDescription: This app needs Bluetooth access to communicate with your PineTime watch and transmit biological age data.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs location access to scan for nearby Bluetooth devices (required by iOS for BLE scanning).
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Location access allows the app to maintain Bluetooth connection with your watch in the background.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This app needs access to your health data to calculate your biological age.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: This app needs to update your health data with calculated biological age information.

plugins.bluetoothAlwaysPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to connect to your PineTime watch for continuous health monitoring

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your location to scan for nearby Bluetooth devices (required by iOS).
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your location to scan for nearby Bluetooth devices (required by iOS).
